Title: Beauty and the Beast: The Enchanted Christmas
Writer: Flip Kobler, Cindy Marcus, Bill Motz, Bob Roth, Carter Crocker, Karl Geurs
Actors: Paige O'Hara, Robby Benson, Jerry Orbach, David Ogden Stiers
Plot: Belle prepares the castle for Christmas against Beast's wishes, trying to bring him happiness for the season. Forte, a pipe organ, fears that Belle's plans may eventually bring about an end to the curse... the curse that brought him more importance in the Master's life. Forte uses Fife, a flute who desperately wants a solo, to destroy Belle's plans and get rid of her.
Production: Disney Television Animation, Walt Disney Animation, DisneyToon Studios
